CHAT.comment: INV places Robodog on the floor.
child bends down to touch Robodog and then jumps back quickly.
child pushes button on Robodog and Robodog moves.
child pushes button on top of Robodog's head.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child turns Robodog around in a different direction.
child makes noise relating to Robodog bleeding and motions that blood gets poured out.
INV removes Robodog from the room.
INV places meerkat on the table.
INV leaves the room.
child shows mom meerkat's bottom.
child walks over to the door and opens it.
mom goes over to the door to get child.
mom makes meerkat dance.
child takes meerkat away from mom.
child drops meerkat on the chair.
child gets on top of the table and pushes meerkat off the table.
mom catches meerkat.
child slides meerkat across the table.
mom slides meerkat across the table and child catches meerkat.
child slides meerkat back to mom.
child makes meerkat jump on the table.
child and mom throw and slide meerkat back and forth.
child throws meerkat over mom's head.
mom hands INV meerkat.
INV removes meerkat from the room.
INV enters the room with degu.
child opens his eyes and sees degu.
mom opens degu cage.
mom touches degu.
mom and INV laugh.
INV enters the room.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
INV removes degu cage from room.
INV and child uncover starfish tank.
INV leaves the room.
mom laughs.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child moves to side of tank.
INV enters the room.
INV covers up starfish tank.
mom laughs.
INV uncovers computer box and child opens his eyes and look at computer box.
INV leaves the room.
computer box beeps.
computer box beeps.
child jumps up and down.
mom demonstrates circular motion with her finger.
computer box beeps and child jumps and sits down.
computer box beeps.
mom demonstrates circular motion with her finger.
child pretends to answer the phone.
child holds up ten fingers.
child pounds on computer box.
INV enters the room.
mom laughs.
INV covers up computer box.
INV rolls the car into the room.
child attempts to say New York City.
mom and child pretend to drive in the car.
child makes a crashing noise as mom and child run into computer box.
INV enters the room.
mom laughs.
child makes noises and pretends he is riding in the elevator.
INV removes car from room.
